Visitors will be directed to a replica of the painted burial chamber, which will be installed close to Carter's former home in Luxor. Replicas of two other closed tombs will be opened nearby. There's no alternative. Closing the tombs is the only way to preserve them, said Zahi Hawass , Egypt's antiquities chief. " Michael Jensen always worked hard on the football field," Brian Finneran said. But as a quarterback, you've got to know everything about that offense, about the line, where the running backs are supposed to be. No question he could have worked harder in the film study room. It's been said before. I think he did the first couple of years, then got a little lax. The ramifications were so great that, as the head of this department of 3 million people, I felt compelled to step forward to take responsibility for the institutional failure. As I began to come to terms with what had happened at Abu Ghraib, the events left me feeling punched in the gut. Yet George W. Bush refused to let Donald Rumsfeld go. during a Thursday conference call with analysts, with Eric Schmidt describing Google's co-founders as his "best friends." "I believe Larry Page is ready" to be CEO, Eric Schmidt said during the call. It's time for him to have a shot at running this. Larry Page hailed Eric Schmidt as a "tremendous leader" whose contributions exceeded all expectations. "There is really no one else in the universe that could have accomplished what Eric Schmidt has done," Larry Page said.
